TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Biocoding
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, removes biocoding from weapons so they don't spawn with it. Does not affect any that have already spawned but will affect mod added ones.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Death Acidifiers
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, removes death acidifiers from pawnKinds so they don't spawn with them. Does not affect any pawns that have already spawned, but will affect mod added pawns.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Allow Any Buildings In Throneroom
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, removes building restrictions in thronerooms. Includes Altars.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Allow Altar in Throneroom
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, specifically allows altars to be built in thronerooms. Pointless if 'any' are allowed already.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Delayed Royalty
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Delays the Royalty starter quests by a few days more than usual to give additional time to get ready for them.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Free Meditation
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows any pawn to use any meditation focus building regardless of the focus types they have. Automatically patches all vanilla and modded meditation sources.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Backstory Limits
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows any pawn to use Natural or Artistic meditation focus types regardless of backstory. If Vanilla Psycasts Expanded is active, this will also handle the psycaster paths being unlockable.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Trading Permit
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, removes the need to hae a permit to trade with the Shattered Empire.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Uninstallable Mech Shields
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows you to uninstall mech cluster shields for your own use. This also prevents them shutting down when the cluster is cleared so they remain useful.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Wait, This Is Better
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Adds previous tier tags to all royal acceptable apparel (including modded) so that apprel of a higher tier will satisfy pawns looking for a lower tier. Should really be the default.
